analysis.summary: NDA signature collection plan for two parties (John Doe and Jane Smith) requiring standard signature fields with an effective date of 2024-01-01.
insights: Document requires signatures from two individual parties
Standard NDA signature requirements include signature, initials, and date for each party
Effective date is predetermined as 2024-01-01, separate from signature dates
No indication of witness or notarization requirements
recommendations: Implement sequential signing: John Doe first (as likely disclosing party), then Jane Smith (as likely receiving party)
Require full signature field for each party at document end
Add initial fields on each page containing confidential terms or obligations
Include separate date field for when each party signs (distinct from effective date)
Consider adding optional fields for printed name and title/company if applicable
Set up automated reminders if signatures not completed within reasonable timeframe
Implement audit trail to track signing sequence and timestamps
